CmdLine: set -ex         && apk add --no-cache --virtual .run-deps                 ffmpeg                 libmagic                 python3                 py3-numpy                 py3-pillow

CmdLine: set -ex         && apk add --update --no-cache --virtual .fetch-deps                 curl                 tar         && curl -L -o EFB-latest.tar.gz                 $(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/blueset/ehForwarderBot/tags                     | grep tarball_url | head -n 1 | cut -d '"' -f 4)         && mkdir -p /opt/ehForwarderBot/storage         && tar -xzf EFB-latest.tar.gz --strip-components=1 -C /opt/ehForwarderBot         && rm EFB-latest.tar.gz         && apk del .fetch-deps         && pip3 install -r /opt/ehForwarderBot/requirements.txt         && rm -rf /root/.cache
Commands.Name: run
